title: Three Nominations Sent to the Senate – The White House
content:
Nominations & Appointments			
Issued on:
September 16, 2020
NOMINATIONS SENT TO THE SENATE:Allen Dickerson, of the District of Columbia, to be a Member of the Federal Election Commission for a term expiring April 30, 2025, vice Caroline C. Hunter, resigned.Michael Rigas, of Massachusetts, to be Deputy Director for Management, Office of Management and Budget, vice Margaret Weichert, resigned.Nathan A. Simington, of Virginia, to be a Member of the Federal Communications Commission for a term of five years from July 1, 2019, vice Michael P. O’Rielly, term expired.
